main event: An airman observed a bright orange meteor-like object descending with sound over Forbes AFB.
interesting points: The object was described as bright with the brightness of a star from ground level,The observation lasted for 5 minutes,The object moved quickly at first but slowed as it reached its peak altitude,It left a visible trail but emitted no sound,The report concluded that it could be a ball meteor or possibly a satellite.
witness description: Observer was TF Maynard, an airman stationed at Forbes AFB.
